---
id: get-api-coins-leaderboard
title: "Get leaderboard"
description: "This endpoint retrieves the top 100 users with the most coins. It returns their public information, such as username, coins, and avatar URL."

import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get leaderboard"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/coins/leaderboard/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint retrieves the top 100 users with the most coins. It returns their public information, such as username, coins, and avatar URL.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"success":{"value":{"statusCode":200,"message":"Leaderboard found","error":null,"leaderboard":[{"_id":"user_id","username":"example_user","coins":1000,"avatarUrl":"https://example.com/avatar.jpg"}]}}}}}},"500":{"content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"serverError":{"value":{"statusCode":500,"message":"Internal Server Error","error":"Internal Server Error"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
